data.name: Fairy And Devil
data.detailed_description:
Kill the barbaric beasts and grab the divine weapons. You can choose three professions: war god, law saint and sword immortal. Take you to relive the fun of fighting monsters to upgrade and fighting BOSS to drop equipment, everything can be obtained in the game. Will give new players a lot of currency, so you can fully enjoy the game!

*Welfare a lot of *
New service 7 days give away more than 100,000 currency, worth more than ￥10,000.
As long as you complete the game objectives you can get VIP, which is the only way to get

*Multi-career choice*
There are three professions to choose from, and each district can create three accounts to fully experience each profession!
War God: melee attack, high attack and high defense
Law saint: legal long-range attack, high attack and blood less
Sword fairy: partial support profession, can also summon pets to assist in battle

* Rich gameplay*
There are more than 10 gameplay methods to participate in every day.
Battle BOSS: There are seven categories and hundreds of BOSSes to kill, and you can get rare equipment and a lot of props after killing them
National war: you can fight for the throne of your country, and lead your subjects to fight for the cross-services cities, in addition, you can kill BOSSes in the cross-services cities, complete various tasks, and get various rewards such as Yuan Bao
Multiplayer dungeons: Highly difficult dungeons that can be entered by teams and can obtain high-level equipment
Plot dungeon: Take you to understand the plot of the game in depth
Material dungeon: you can get various resources to improve your strength
Tower of Heaven: You can get battle patterns and materials to upgrade battle patterns
Break through the Heavenly Pass: you can get the materials to upgrade your partner
Magic Rift: you can get a lot of experience value
Guarding beauty: a good way to get experience and many rewards
Jade Sea Flying Boat: the main source of gold coins
Spiritual Weapon Copy: A great place to get spiritual weapons
Cave Treasure Hunt: You can get powerful rings (paralysis rings, divine power rings, body protection rings, etc.)
Heavenly Symbol Martial Arts Arena: you can get points and gold, points can be exchanged for many rare props
Yuanbao Turtle: A large amount of Yuanbao is distributed for free, you can pick it up by killing the turtle!
Barbarian invasion: The barbarian king leads the clan to invade the main city, after killing you can get senior equipment
Chaos Battlefield: Enter the Chaos Rift to get a generous reward for each layer, the higher the layer the more generous the reward, and the higher the difficulty of the BOSS!

*Rich dungeons*
There are close to 15 copies to get a lot of props
Over 20 boss maps to choose from

*Numerous systems*
There are systems such as Dao Realm, Reincarnation, Elixir, Soul Bone, Battle Pattern, Partner, Pet, etc. that can be used to improve your abilities, and most of the resources can be obtained in-game

*Large amount of resources*
You only need to hang, fight BOSS, participate in activities to activate a variety of artifacts, strange treasures, divine rings, so as to obtain a large number of attributes and powerful skills!

data.short_description: Kill monsters and get equipment. After choosing the three professions of War God, Law Saint and Sword Immortal, you can experience the fun of fighting monsters and upgrading, fighting BOSS to drop equipment, everything can be obtained in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
